definition: the contents of the cup/(fig.) liquor/wine
variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: He heard the contents of the glass being poured into the sink .
sentences.chinese: 他听到杯中物被倒进水盆里。

sentences.english: He emptied the cup at a draught.
He emptied his glass at one draught.

definition: wine and women/color of wine/drunken expression
dilettante/amateur/to dabble in/to flirt with (a topic)
dilettante/amateur/to dabble in/to flirt with (a topic)
never to touch a drop of alcohol
to moisten one's lips/to sip (wine, tea etc)/esp. used with negatives: never touch a drop of the stuff
a thousand cups of wine is not too much when best friends meet (idiom)/when you're with close friends, you can let your hair down
